tags.string:
since v9.5.0 
Use the class SearchEndpoint from `@knora/api` (github:dasch-swiss/knora-api-js-lib) instead.

Performs searches (fulltext or extended) and search count queries into Knora.
tags.html:
since v9.5.0
Use the class SearchEndpoint from @knora/api (github:dasch-swiss/knora-api-js-lib) instead.

Performs searches (fulltext or extended) and search count queries into Knora.
